verses.name: Genesis 41:11
verses.text: And we dreamed a dream in one night, I and he; we dreamed each man according to the interpretation of his dream.

verses.name: Genesis 41:12
verses.text: And there was there with us a young man, an Hebrew, servant to the captain of the guard; and we told him, and he interpreted to us our dreams; to each man according to his dream he did interpret.

verses.name: Genesis 41:13
verses.text: And it came to pass, as he interpreted to us, so it was; me he restored unto mine office, and him he hanged.
